Dodger

It seems to me US final decision, concerning to military actions against Iran, has already been adopted. See for yourself. The head of US War Department, D. Rumsfeld, made third visit to Azerbaijan per annum. If you weigh strict secrecy of American-Azeri talks with construction of pads and airdrome terminals in Azerbaijan and appropriation of US additional funds for training of Azeri military, it becomes clear why Pentagon's chief has such great interest in Azerbaijan. The answer is at the root of War Department's plans. It's obvious the Pentagon decided to bomb Iran from the territory of neighbouring Azerbaijan. It will be more suitable and economic for Yankees.
